title: Allow $targetnametoken$ and $targetentrypoint$ in desktop:Extension element of appxmanifest
body: In .appxmanifest files, the <Application> element supports $targetnametoken$ and $targetentrypoint$ variables, which the Windows Application Package Project uses in its template .appxmanifest file. The <desktop:Extension> element, however, does not, which leads to some guessing as to what the Executable attribute should be.
